sectionSubHeading: Explore each of your study options at Melbourne including courses with additional entry requirements and our pathways to graduate study.

One of our most prestigious scholarships for school leavers, the Melbourne Chancellor’s Scholarship offers generous fee exemptions, a guaranteed place in the graduate program of your choice at Melbourne and more. Awarded based on academic merit, this scholarship is available alongside all of our undergraduate degrees.

sectionHeading: Where can your ATAR take you?
sectionSubHeadingInternational: The ATARs displayed are for international students who have completed an Australian Year 12 qualification or the International Baccalaureate (IB) Diploma. If you meet all course prerequisites and achieve the International Guaranteed ATAR (or notional ATAR), you will be guaranteed a place in your chosen degree.
sectionSubHeading: Use course entry requirements to explore your course options and to plan ahead with confidence. Domestic students may also be eligible for our special entry access scheme, Access Melbourne. To understand more about lowest selection ranks, guaranteed ATAR and the Access Melbourne guarantee, please read our FAQs.
sectionCountText: courses found with ATAR-based entry, based on an ATAR of
noResultsBullets: Learn more about our alternative entry pathways including the Diploma in General Studies for domestic students and Trinity College Foundation Studies for international students.

sectionSubHeading:
For the courses displayed below, you'll need to meet our ATAR requirement and supply additional information to apply. The entry requirements for these courses includes a 'range of criteria', which in addition to an ATAR score may include submitting a portfolio or attending an audition or interview.

Check out which of these courses you may be eligible for and learn more about application requirements and deadlines by visiting the relevant course page.
sectionCountText: courses with range of criteria based entry
rhsSubHeading: Stay in touch to find out when we're accepting new applications for your preferred course.

sectionSubHeading:
If you already know the area you want to specialise in, a Graduate Degree Package can help secure both your undergraduate course and a graduate place before you begin your studies. Packages are available for both domestic and international students. Access Melbourne guaranteed ATARs are also available for select Graduate Degree Packages.

Find out more about Graduate Degree Packages including benefits, general eligibility criteria and additional entry requirements

From day one of your studies, you can choose to focus on your career with our range of flexible undergraduate degrees and graduate study options. Below are common career pathways to explore – but this is just a small selection of what’s possible at Melbourne.

sectionHeading: Need more information about our courses?
sectionSubHeading: Get in touch with our student services team at Stop 1. Chat to us one-on-one and ask any questions you have about studying at Melbourne.
